name: $identifier
desc: Returns: The Substance ID of the sugar or sugar-like component that make up the nucleotide.

name: $::name
desc: Returns: The name of the sugar or sugar-like component that make up the nucleotide.

name: $residueSite
desc: Returns: The residues that contain a given sugar will be captured. The order of given residues will be captured in the 5‘-3‘direction consistent with the base sequences listed above.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The residues that contain a given sugar will be captured. The order of given residues will be captured in the 5‘-3‘direction consistent with the base sequences listed above.
